parameters.name: ListenerPort
parameters.description:
The frontend port that is used by the SLB instance. Valid values: **1 to 65535**.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the health status of all ports is returned.

parameters.name: ListenerProtocol
parameters.description: The frontend protocol that is used by the SLB instance.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID of the Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the SLB instance.
